thread.title: Fire engulfs casino shuttle boat off Florida coast

title: Fire engulfs casino shuttle boat off Florida coast
text:
Fire engulfs casino shuttle boat off Florida coast   00:53 
At least 15 people were injured when a fire engulfed a boat off the coast of Florida on Sunday, but the Port Richey Police Chief says it doesn't appear as though the injuries are serious. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
